presentation.title: Mutual Fund Workshop
presentation.subtitle: Decoding the Matrix: A Tech Professional's Guide to MF Investing
presentation.author: Workshop Presenter

slides.title: Title Slide
slides.subtitle: The Code to Wealth: Mutual Fund Investing for Tech Professionals
slides.description: Introduction and welcome to the mutual fund investing workshop designed specifically for technology professionals

slides.title: Opening Hook
slides.subtitle: Why This Workshop Won't Be Another Boring Finance Lecture
slides.description: Engaging opening that connects technology concepts with financial investing principles

slides.title: The MF Stack
slides.subtitle: Understanding the Basics - Mutual Funds: The Microservices of Investment
slides.description: Fundamental explanation of mutual funds using technology analogies and microservices concepts

slides.title: The Three Pillars Framework
slides.subtitle: Goal-Time-Risk: The Holy Trinity of Investment
slides.description: Core framework for investment decision-making based on three key factors: investment goals, time horizon, and risk tolerance

slides.title: The Goal-Time-Risk Triage Matrix
slides.subtitle: Matching Funds to Your Life's User Stories
slides.description: Interactive decision matrix to help match appropriate mutual fund types to individual investment scenarios and life situations

slides.title: The Power of Compounding
slides.subtitle: Exponential Growth: The Eighth Wonder of the World
slides.description: Interactive exploration of compounding principles, early vs late investing scenarios, real-world examples, and behavioral aspects of long-term wealth creation

slides.title: Fund Categories Deep Dive
slides.subtitle: The Fund Taxonomy: Choosing Your Tech Stack
slides.description: Detailed exploration of different fund categories and their characteristics

slides.title: Performance Evaluation Framework
slides.subtitle: KPIs for Your Investment Dashboard
slides.description: Comprehensive metrics for evaluating both equity and debt fund performance using familiar analytics concepts

slides.title: Risk Evaluation Framework
slides.subtitle: Debugging Your Portfolio Risk Profile
slides.description: Framework for assessing and managing investment risk

slides.title: Real Performance Data Examples
slides.subtitle: Show Me the Numbers: Actual Fund Performance Analysis
slides.description: Real-world examples of fund performance analysis

slides.title: Fund Selection Checklist
slides.subtitle: The Code Review Process for Mutual Funds
slides.description: Systematic approach to selecting the right mutual funds

slides.title: The SIP Strategy
slides.subtitle: Systematic Investment Plans: The DevOps of Investing
slides.description: Understanding and implementing systematic investment plans

slides.title: Common Investment Mistakes
slides.subtitle: The Production Bugs of Mutual Fund Investing
slides.description: Common pitfalls to avoid in mutual fund investing

slides.title: Questions & Answers
slides.subtitle: Let's Debug Your Investment Queries
slides.description: Interactive Q&A session for all investment-related questions and doubts
